direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods create Safelist instances with different sets of allowed tags and attributes.
Both methods configure Safelist instances with specific sets of allowed tags and attributes, focusing on text formatting.
Both methods configure Safelist instances with similar sets of allowed tags and attributes, with basicWithImages extending basic to include image tags.
Both methods configure Safelist instances with extended sets of allowed tags and attributes, with relaxed allowing more tags and attributes than basic.
The basic method internally calls addTags to configure the allowed tags, making it a direct dependency.
The basic method internally calls addAttributes to configure the allowed attributes for specific tags, making it a direct dependency.
The basic method internally calls addProtocols to configure the allowed URL protocols for specific attributes, making it a direct dependency.
The basic method internally calls addEnforcedAttribute to enforce specific attribute values, making it a direct dependency.
